official_title: A bill to amend title 23, United States Code, to require that any State requesting a lower Federal share for certain types of highway projects be provided that lower share.

summary.text: Amends the law relating to the Federal share payable on projects on the Federal-aid highway system to provide that if a State requests a Federal share which is less than the maximum permitted then the Federal share shall be the share requested by the State.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 23, United States Code, to require that any State requesting a lower Federal share for certain types of highway projects be provided that lower share.
